title: Tennis Fundamentals
description: Tennis is a racket sport played individually or in pairs. Test your knowledge about Grand Slams, famous players, and tennis terminology.

questions.question: How many Grand Slam tournaments are there in professional tennis?
What are the four Grand Slam tournaments called?
options: Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open
Australian Open, French Open, British Open, US Open
Australian Open, Roland Garros, Wimbledon, US Open
Aussie Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open
questions.correct_answer: Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open

questions.question: Which surface is used at Wimbledon?

Which player has won the most Grand Slam singles titles in the Open Era?
What is the term for winning the ball on the first shot after the serve?

Which player is known as the 'King of Clay'?
